评论概述: Nice, well-constructed billfold - perfect width for me
评论详情: I specifically chose this billfold for its size - 3.25” width. Not 3” nor 3.5”. The reason is that I have a few 5-pocket pants where a billfold can slip into a hidden, zipped pocket. A 3.5” width billfold is difficult to get out of the hidden pocket, and a 3” width doesn’t hide the dollar bills it holds. A wider billfold is fine for most pant pockets, of course, but I wanted mine to fit in the zipped pocket for the added security. I also wanted to avoid the added flap many billfolds include for ID, so it would be a little thinner when cards are added. One note: A 3.25” width doesn’t completely hide larger euro bills (like a 50€). The RFID performs well. I’m happy with the look, feel and quality of this billfold.

评论详情: Met or exceeded all expectations - price, appearance, quality construction, and features without excess card holders and bill partitions. Makes me question how good the RFID really is. Otherwise, I would have a glowing 5 stars.
